properties.name: messengerservice.enabled
properties.description: Send messages by messenger or not.

properties.name: messengerservice.channel
properties.description: Name of the Slack channel to publish the messages

properties.name: messengerservice.token
properties.description: The security token to use Slack

properties.name: schedulerservice.tare.cron
properties.description: Cron expression when to tare the scale

properties.name: mqtt.user
properties.description: User id of the mqtt service

properties.name: mqtt.clientId.producer
properties.description: Client id of the producer of mqtt events

properties.name: mqtt.clientId.consumer
properties.description: Client id of the consumer of mqtt events
